Support to do your best work

We offer competitive and comprehensive benefits, although lots of companies can offer you those. We also have a rarer opportunity: The impact you can make from being at a nimble startup, working on a platform that operates at a significant (and quickly growing) scale.

  • Work anywhere
    in the world

    You do you. Just send us a postcard..We all know that the ability to travel and work from around the world is exciting during these times and we want you to enjoy your time. We are not here to count the hours you are working, we are here for our common mission.

    Work anywhere
    in the world

    You do you. Just send us a postcard..We all know that the ability to travel and work from around the world is exciting during these times and we want you to enjoy your time. We are not here to count the hours you are working, we are here for our common mission.

  • Come into the office.
    Or don't! It's up to you...

    We want you to work from wherever is most comfortable for you and are here to make this a reality, whether that is in an office or at home.

  • Parental
    leave

    You're our team, so you're family. And we want you to be able to care for yours.Docquity understands the importance of parental leave and offers biological, adoptive and foster parents paid time off to spend quality time with your family.
